Skazaly yim: «Voistynu, lyudy zibralysya proty vas. Tozh biytesʹ yikh!» Ale tse lyshe dodalo yim viry. Tomu vony vidpovily: «Dostatnʹo nam Allaha! Prekrasnyy zhe Vin Opikun
Tozh vony povernulysʹ iz mylistyu vid Allaha ta laskoyu Yoho. Zlo ne torknulosya yikh, i vony pishly za blahovolinnyam Allaha. Allah — Volodar velykoyi lasky
Tse lyshe shaytan zalyakuye vas svoyimy pomichnykamy. Ale ne biytesʹ yikh, a biytesʹ Mene, yakshcho ye vy viruyuchymy

Nekhay zhe ne zasmuchuyutʹ tebe ti, yaki pospishayutʹ u svoyemu nevirʺyi. Vony niyak ne zmozhutʹ zashkodyty Allahu. Allah bazhaye, shchob vony ne maly chastky v nastupnomu zhytti. Na nykh chekaye velyka kara
Voistynu, ti yaki kupyly nevirʺya za viru, niyak ne zmozhutʹ zashkodyty Allahu. Na nykh chekaye bolisna kara
Nekhay zhe ne dumayutʹ ti, yaki ne viruyutʹ, shcho Nasha vidstrochka ye blahom dlya nykh. My daly yim vidstrochku lyshe dlya toho, shchob vony zbilʹshyly svoyi hrikhy. Na nykh chekaye prynyzlyva kara

Allah ne zalyshytʹ viruyuchykh u tomu stani, u yakomu vy perebuvayete, poky ne vidriznytʹ Vin mizh pohanym ta dobrym. Allah ne navchytʹ vas potayemnoho, ale Allah obyraye sered poslantsiv Svoyikh toho, koho pobazhaye. Tozh uviruyte v Allaha ta Yoho poslantsiv! I yakshcho vy uviruyete i budete bohoboyazlyvymy, to otrymayete velyku vynahorodu

Nekhay zhe ne dumayutʹ ti, yaki vyyavlyayutʹ skupistʹ u tomu, shcho Allah daruvav yim zi Svoyeyi lasky, shcho tse krashche dlya nykh! Ta zh ni, tse hirshe dlya nykh.
